matches.extracted: Plumbers with names that begin with an A or a number receive more than five times as many complaints with the Better Business Bureau.
matches.expected: Those with names that begin with an A or a number receive more than five times as many complaints with the Better Business Bureau.

matches.extracted: Firms with names that begin with an 'A' or a number received significantly more complaints than other firms.
matches.expected: Firms with names beginning with an A or a number receive more complaints.

matches.extracted: “A” Business by Any Other Name: Firm Name Choice as a Signal of Firm Quality
matches.expected: A Business by Any Other Name: Firm Name Choice as a Signal of Firm Quality

extracted: H*: Firms that use names beginning with an A or a number will receive more complaints than firms not using names beginning with an A or a number.
mismatches.expected: Firms that use names beginning with an A or a number will receive more complaints than firms not using names beginning with an A or a number.

extracted.name: ReferenceUSA and Better Business Bureau datasets

access.restrictions: ReferenceUSA requires access through a local library; BBB.org is publicly accessible.

mismatches.extracted: The study analyzes complaints filed with the Better Business Bureau against plumbing firms to determine the impact of firm names on perceived quality.
mismatches.expected: Data was collected from ReferenceUSA for plumbing firms in Illinois and matched with complaint data from the Better Business Bureau.

extracted: Collect firm data from ReferenceUSA including name, employees, advertising expenditure, etc.
Collect complaints data from the Better Business Bureau for these firms.
Analyze the relationship between firm names and the number and rate of complaints using regression analysis.
expected: Collect list of plumbing firms from ReferenceUSA.
Match firms with complaint data from BBB.org.
Analyze the relationship between firm name and number of complaints.

extracted.name: ReferenceUSA and Better Business Bureau datasets

mismatches.extracted:
1. Load the ReferenceUSA and Better Business Bureau datasets using pandas.
2. Merge datasets on common identifiers (firm names, addresses).
3. Compute basic statistics and descriptive analyses.
4. Conduct regression analysis using statsmodels to evaluate the impact of firm name characteristics on the number of complaints.
5. Compare estimated coefficients and confidence intervals with the original study findings.
mismatches.expected: Run a regression of complaints on firm_a using OLS.

mismatches.extracted: Incident Rate Ratios, p-values, confidence intervals, and summary statistics.
